original_text: And I declare to him that I am about to punish his house forever, for the iniquity that he knew, because his sons were blaspheming God, and he did not restrain them.
korean_text: 내가 그의 집을 영원토록 심판하겠다고 그에게 말한 것은 그가 아는 죄악 때문이니 이는 그가 자기의 아들들이 저주를 자청하되 금하지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: that I am about to punish his house forever
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그의 집을 영원히 벌하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: for the iniquity that he knew
because his sons were blaspheming God
and he did not restrain them
